title: Not lagging, no fps drops, intervals of 2-5 seconds of not being able to move champion
body: So I'll be in lane last hitting creeps when I click to move and my champion will follow the cursor but sometimes there are instances where I wont be able to move my character again for another 2-5 seconds. Everything around me is moving normally, I have 28 ping on a wired connection and frames capped at 60fps. I see many people with the same issue but I haven't found any solutions, pls help.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: This sounds like an input delay issue, which can be caused by connection problems like packet loss.  I recommend running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to know for sure and figure out what's going wrong.  The results should also provide some troubleshooting instructions to fix things up.  Let me know what you find out!
After the recent patch my lag issues subsided. Not too sure why but I am very happy because of this :D
